## Bot Commands

### General

| Command | Description                   |
| :------ | :---------------------------- |
| /chat   | Interact with chatgpt         |
| /repo   | Fetch one of the OWDDM repos. |



### Memes

| Command | Description                               |
| :------ | :---------------------------------------- |
| /cowsay | emulates the famous UNIX program 'cowsay' |

### Moderation

| Command | Description |
| :------ | :---------- |
| /roles  |             |
